title: lol PBE
body: why pls help me i want to play on lol pbe but i dont know where is for downloading pls {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: it doesn't look like the account you're posting from is currently accepted into the PBE.  We can't expedite or guarantee acceptance, but more information on how testers are chosen can be found in our [PBE FAQ](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  Best of luck with your admissions!
